title: The Two Most Significant Players In Basketball
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Kendra Andrews and Marc J. Spears to talk the significance of Draymond Green to the Warriors as he returns to action including how vital he may be to overcoming Western Conference foes like Memphis. Plus, Windy and Spears discuss Kyrie’s status in home games and what strategy may be in place in Brooklyn.

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collecitve: How Draymond Green And Kyrie Irving May Decide Who Wins The Finals
